sentences.en: In fact, the Spartina genus is the dominant plant found in salt marshes.
sentences.cn: 事实上，米草是盐沼中的主要植物。

sentences.en: In these cases, the "constrictor" and "sapiens" are the species names, and "boa" and "homo" are the genus names.
sentences.cn: 在这些案例中，“大蟒”和“智人”是种名，“蟒属”和“人属”是一个属名。

sentences.en: It's the type genus of the menyanthaceae.
